# TAB

**TAB** is a plugin for beautiful styling of the player list (Tab-list) and information above heads.

---

## ğŸ“‹ What is it?

TAB is responsible for:

- ğŸ“Š **Tab-list** â€” player list when pressing Tab
- ğŸ·ï¸ **Tags above head** â€” names and information above players
- ğŸ“ˆ **Statistics** â€” displaying online count and other information

---

## ğŸ‘€ What You See

### Tab-list

When pressing **Tab** you see:

| Element | Description |
|---------|----------|
| **Header** | Server information |
| **Player list** | All online players |
| **Status** | AFK, role and more |
| **Footer** | Additional information |

### Tags Above Head

Above players displays:
- Nickname
- AFK status (if applicable)
- Other information

---

## ğŸ’¡ Features

### Player Sorting

Players in Tab-list can be sorted by:
- Alphabet
- Join time
- Role/group

### Color Design

Different player groups can have different nickname colors for quick recognition.

---

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**Why is my nickname a different color?**</summary>

Nickname color depends on your role on the server. Administrators, moderators and regular players may have different colors.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Can I change my color?**</summary>

Color is determined automatically based on your role. Regular players cannot change it manually.

</details>

---

## ğŸ‘» Hide Nicknames

For more complete immersion you can hide your nickname or visibility of other nicknames.

### Commands for Your Nickname

| Command | Description |
|---------|----------|
| `/nametag-hide` | Hide your nickname for everyone |
| `/nametag-show` | Show your nickname |
| `/nametag-toggle` | Toggle your nickname visibility |

### Commands for Other Nicknames

| Command | Description |
|---------|----------|
| `/nametag-hideview` | Hide other players' nicknames for yourself |
| `/nametag-showview` | Show other players' nicknames |
| `/nametag-toggleview` | Toggle other nicknames visibility |

:::tip Tip
Hiding nicknames is useful for recording videos, screenshots, or deeper immersion in the game atmosphere.
:::
